thread.title: New Rules Will Change How Research on Humans Is Disclosed

author: Daniela Hernandez
title: New Rules Will Change How Research on Humans Is Disclosed
text:
The National Institutes of Health has established sweeping new rules governing research conducted on humans, requiring scientists who receive federal funding to publicly disclose more of their researchâ€”and causing confusion and consternation at some institutions.
The guidelines expand what constitutes a clinical trial and require scientists to register a larger swath of human research on the public online repository for clinical trials, Clinicaltrials.gov.
